message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,000.  It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can only afford to pay up to $7,500 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $7,500 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $8,500. That's a fair price for both of us, and I hope you'll consider it. Let's make this happen!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I still believe I can only afford to pay up to $8,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
